Evaluation Criteria:

Overall (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Overall impression of the dialog?
- A float score near 1 (Low Quality Dialogue) means that the system fails to understand or respond correctly to user requests, provides inaccurate or irrelevant information, and the dialogue flow is incoherent.
- A float score near 2 (Moderate Quality Dialogue) means that the system understands and responds correctly to user requests most of the time, but occasionally misunderstands or provides slightly inaccurate information, the dialogue flow is generally coherent.
- A float score near 3 (High Quality Dialogue) means that the system consistently understands and responds correctly to user requests, provides accurate and relevant information, and the dialogue flow is coherent and natural.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How are you?
System: Everything is going extremely well. How are you?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what did you have for lunch today?
System: Ah. I had a ham sandwich and some lemonade.

System: It is the same as ever.

User: yeah, are you excited today except the boring sandwich?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you today?
User: It's Friday, Friday, Friday :D
System: YAY! I love Fridays!
User: Do you like Rebecca Black's Friday?
System: She's okay. I prefer Friday by Rebecca Sugar.
User: okay. How does that song go?

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Have you seen any good movies lately?
User: Last weekend I saw "The Parasite." Ever heard of it?
System: No. Why did you pick that movie?
User: My friend wanted to see it. It has great reviews on IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes! What did you do last weekend?
System: I played music and worked on some side projects. I also started watching the new Disney service.
User: Oooo the Mandalorian?!?!
System: Mostly, the deleted scenes from Avengers.. lol
User: lol Are you a big Marvel fan?
System: I loved the X-Men as a kid, and even collected the comic cards. Recently, I got very into the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies. How many Avengers movies have you seen?
User: I've only seen Spiderman. Honestly it was a little too scary and so I don't think I can bring myself to watch the other Marvel movies! haha
System: Oh!-- I have a friend who looks like the actor who plays Spiderman.
User: Oh really? To be honest I think the actor is not that good looking, so not so surprising! haha
System: Yea. I think Loki is the most handsome :D
User: Who is Loki? I've never heard that name before

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey how's it going
User: It's good it's good. How are you?
System: good. it's really hot today. I think I'm going to the pool
User: Oh nice! Where do you live?
System: I live in Tokyo, Japan
User: Ahh yes, Japan is hot during the summer. Last time I was in Kyoto it was 114 degrees....
System: oh have you been?
User: Yes yes. I've been to Tokyo as well. It's so nice!
System: what did you do here?
User: Oh everything! I went to an onsen, the fish market, disney land and giant robot fighting show haha
System: lol why did you come to Japan just to go to Disney land?
User: The Disney lands are all different! There's also Disney Sea, which is completely unique!

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you today?
User: Good! Have you seen the movie 'The Iron Giant', it's one my favorite movies
System: Yes! I love that movie!
User: it's the best. Which part do you like the most?
System: Honestly, I love the whole movie.
User: Brad Bird is an amazing director. I worked with him on "Incredibles 2"
System: Really? That's awesome! What do you do?
User: I"m a REDACTED_TERM and REDACTED_TERM. I basically help design the characters that you see in the movies
System: That's awesome! That's pretty cool.
User: yup! Maybe one day you can be one of those cool characters yourself!
System: That would be the coolest.
User: What do you want to be later on in your life?
System: I want to own my own business.
User: cool! what kind?
System: An art gallery or bookstore.
User: My mom had a similar dream. Of owning a coffee shop somewhere in Mexico
System: That would be nice. I like coffee.
User: She loves people and a place where they can get together
System: That's very sweet. What does she do?
User: Currently she's a real-estate agent
System: That's very interesting. Does she enjoy being a real estate agent?
User: I think so!! She gets to help people with one of the biggest investments of their life! Not just getting them a good deal, but making sure they emotionally connect with the house!

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How are you?
System: My logic and cognitive functions are normal.
User: That's funny. I just got to work!
System: I am so delighted that you are amused. OK, better get busy.
User: I'm procrastinating though.
System: Oh. What are you waiting for?
User: Inspiration to hit me.
System: Do you have only a few friends?
User: How is that related, lol?
System: It isn't. I was just being random. Did I amuse you?
User: Yeah that was funny though I could see it coming across as judgemental.
System: Good. People seem more friendly towards me when they are happy. What's so funny?
User: Nothing anymore. What are you up to today?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: can you help me ?
System: What kind of help would you like?
User: hmm like booking a ticket or ordering food ?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. Interesting comparison.
User: oh you know to count ?
System: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 ten.
User: lol what's after that ?
System: I am glad you find this funny. The successor to that
User: okay tell me what comes after 10 ?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How are you? :D
User: i am good
System: Well, that's good to hear. :D
User: can you tell me the weather today
System: It's raining. You? :D
User: oh! where are you
System: I'm in Texas. :D You?
User: cool, i am in the bay area
System: Cool. Do you like it there?
User: yes
System: Well, I'm glad you like it. :D
User: have you been here
System: I haven't. :D
User: ok bye then
